tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta olmak, tamamen ve açık olarak, buranın ve şu anın sadeliğine ve zarafetine katılmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Donald Altman

tr_quotes.quote: Vizyonu olmayan insanlar yok olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Ne aradığınızı, neyden kaçtığınızı ve bu sonuçlara ulaşabilmek için kendinizde neleri değiştirmeniz gerektiğini anlamanız önemlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi canlı hissettiren şey gelişimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Minimalizm daha azına sahip olmak değildir. Daha fazlası için yer açmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dün imkansız görünen şey, sıklıkla yarın kolay görünecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk içten gelir, sizin içinizden gelir ve anlamlı bir yaşam sürmekle mümkün olur
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Siz geliştikçe başkalarının da gelişmesine yardımcı olabilirsiniz ve başkalarının gelişmesine yardımcı oldukça daha çok gelişirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Vazgeçmek özgürleştirir.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Bizi rahatsız eden, şeyler değil, o şeylere atfettiğimiz önemdir.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Etrafınızdaki insanları değiştiremezsiniz ama etrafınızdaki insanları değiştirebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Yüz yüze etkileşim de bulunmak, çaba harcamak, bir yardım işine kendinizi tamamen vermiş olmanın sağladığı akılsal aktivite para bağışında bulunmaktan çok daha tatminkardır.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer gelişmeye devam etmek istiyorsanız standartlarınızı yükseltmeye devam etmelisiniz; aksi taktirde duraklamaya geçersiniz. Hatta daha da kötüsü, standartlarınızı düşürürseniz körelirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları sevin ve eşyaları kullanın.Çünkü tam tersi asla işe yaramaz.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek gelişimin anahtarı tutarliliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik, tüm gerçek zarafetin temel noktasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk içten gelir, sizin içinizden gelir ve anlamlı bir yaşam sürmekle mümkün olur.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Bizi rahatsız eden, şeyler değil, o şeylere atfettiğimiz önemdir.
tr_quotes.author: Epiktetus

tr_quotes.quote: Kimliğinizi anlamlı yaşamınızdan almalısınız, maaşınızı kazanmak için yaptığınız işten değil.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Elimizden geldiğince denememize rağmen statü ve maddi sahiplikler üzerinden mutluluk arama çabalarımız bize hiçbir zaman gerçek ve uzun süren mutluluk ve hoşnutluk sağlamadı.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Bizi rahatsız eden, şeyler değil, o şeylere atfettigimiz önemdir.
tr_quotes.author: Epiktetus

tr_quotes.quote: Açıkça ifade edin, sadeliği kucaklayın, bencilliği azaltın, çok az arzuya sahip olun.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları sevin ve eşyaları kullanın.Çünkü tam tersi asla işe yaramaz.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Güven, güven doğurur.
tr_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk aslında azla yetinmek, şükretmeyi bilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arabanız mahvolmuş olabilir, ama gününüzün mahvolması gerekmez
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Önemli olan, hayatta en çok şeye sahip olmak değil, en az şeye ihtiyaç duymaktır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik çekicidir.
tr_quotes.author: J.A.Redmerski

tr_quotes.quote: Kimse sadelikten ölmez.
tr_quotes.author: Pierre Loti

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek sanatçılar sadeleştirir.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik, aklın özüdür.
tr_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik kadınların hoşuna gider.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Sade yaşa ki başkaları da var olabilsin.
tr_quotes.author: Gandi

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik, mükemmelliğe giden yoldur.
tr_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik, karışık düşünceleri süsler.
tr_quotes.author: Vauvenargues

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat sade olmalı,ama yalın olmamalı.
tr_quotes.author: Sezai Karakoç

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek, kesinlik ister, tutku ise sadelik.
tr_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşam her zaman sadeliği sever.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Fazla mal göz çıkarmaz. derler; belki doğru ama lâfın fazlası öyle değil, can bile çıkartır. Sözde de, özde de sadelik.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik, aklın özüdür.
tr_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

tr_quotes.quote: Doğallığın verdiği huzuru, doğal olmayan yollarda arama. Sadelik, sahtelik sevmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik, iyilik ve doğruluk olmayan yerde, büyüklük yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan içinde karmaşık dışında sade olmamalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadelik beynin dostudur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sade yaşa, geniş düşün, her zaman mutlu ol.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek, kesinlik ister, tutku ise sadelik.
tr_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

tr_quotes.quote: Hedefi güç olanların bulamadığı huzuru, hedefi sadelik ve kenarda sessizce yaşamak olanlar buldu.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Benim anlayışıma göre tatlım, dili bağlı sadelik; az konuşur, ama çok şey ifade eder.
tr_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: I am a minimalist. I like saying the most with the least.
en_quotes.author: Bob Newh

en_quotes.quote: The first step in crafting the life you want is to get rid of everything you don’t.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Becker

en_quotes.quote: My goal is no longer to get more done, but rather to have less to do.
en_quotes.author: Francine Jay

en_quotes.quote: I’ve learned that minimalism is not about what you own, it’s about why you own it.
en_quotes.author: Brian Gardner

en_quotes.quote: Fill your life with lost of experiences, not lots of things. Have incredible stories to tell, not incredible clutter in your closets.
en_quotes.author: MarcAndAngel

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism is the intentional promotion of the things we most value and the removal of anything that distracts us from it.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Becker

en_quotes.quote: The essence of philosophy is that we should live so that our happiness depends as little as possible on external causes.
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: There are two ways to be rich: One is by acquiring much, and the other is by desiring little.
en_quotes.author: Jackie French Koller

en_quotes.quote: Make things as simple as possible, but no simpler.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Reduce the complexity of life by eliminating the needless wants of life, and the labors of life reduce themselves.
en_quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

en_quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: It is preoccupation with possession, more than anything else, that prevents men from living freely and nobly.
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they haven’t earned, to buy things they don’t want, to impress people they don’t like.
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: As you simplify your life, the laws of the universe will be simpler; solitude will not be solitude, poverty will not be poverty, nor weakness weakness.
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: The secret of happiness, you see, is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Have nothing in your homes that you do not know to be useful or believe to be beautiful.
en_quotes.author: William Morris

en_quotes.quote: Many of those who have the most make only the least of what they have.
en_quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

en_quotes.quote: We go on multiplying our conveniences only to multiply our cares. We increase our possessions only to the enlargement of our anxieties.
en_quotes.author: Anna C. Brackett

en_quotes.quote: More than the homeless, we have, not only money and possessions but also potential sources of things such as worry and unhappiness.
en_quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

en_quotes.quote: The consumption society has made us feel that happiness lies in having things, and has failed to teach us the happiness of not having things.
en_quotes.author: Elise Boulding

en_quotes.quote: The simplest things are often the truest.
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with simple living is that, though it can be joyful, rich, and creative, it isnt simple.
en_quotes.author: Doris Janzen Longacre

en_quotes.quote: Simplicity is an acquired taste. Mankind, left free, instinctively complicates life.
en_quotes.author: Katharine Fullerton Gerould

en_quotes.quote: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
en_quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

en_quotes.quote: Purposefully owning less begins to take us out of the unwinnable game of comparison.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Becker

en_quotes.quote: One can furnish a room very luxuriously by taking out furniture rather than putting it in.
en_quotes.author: Francis Jourdain

en_quotes.quote: Truth is ever to be found in simplicity, and not in the multiplicity and confusion of things.
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: There is no greatness where there is not simplicity, goodness, and truth.
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: Purity and simplicity are the two wings with which man soars above the earth and all temporary nature.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Kempis

en_quotes.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Simplicity is the glory of expression.
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: If your mind isn’t clouded by unnecessary things, then this is the best season of your life.
en_quotes.author: Wu

en_quotes.quote: The man who has two tunics is to share with him who has none; and he who has food is to do likewise.
en_quotes.author: John the Baptist

en_quotes.quote: Be a curator of your life. Slowly cut things out until you’re left only with what you love, with what’s necessary, with what makes you happy.
en_quotes.author: Leo Babauta

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism is just the beginning. Its a tool. Once you’ve gone ahead and minimized, its time to find out what those important things are.
en_quotes.author: Fumio Sasaki

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism is built around the idea that there’s nothing that you’re lacking.
en_quotes.author: Fumio Sasaki

en_quotes.quote: For everything we say yes to, were saying no to something else.
en_quotes.author: Ryder Carroll

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism means not trying to improve perfection.
en_quotes.author: Bryant McGill

en_quotes.quote: The numerous choices you have around yourself are often superficial; they don’t matter. The art lies in doing more with less. Minimal requirements, more work.
en_quotes.author: Vishal Ostwal

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism is the constant art of editing your life.
en_quotes.author: Danny Dover

en_quotes.quote: My riches consist, not in the extent of my possessions, but in the fewness of my wants.
en_quotes.author: Joseph Brotherton

en_quotes.quote: Want to know how to make yourself instantly unhappy? Compare yourself with someone else.
en_quotes.author: Fumio Sasaki

en_quotes.quote: The best criterion for choosing what to keep and what to discard is whether keeping it will make you happy, whether it will bring you joy.
en_quotes.author: Marie Kondō

en_quotes.quote: The question of what you want to own is actually the question of how you want to live your life.
en_quotes.author: Marie Kondō

en_quotes.quote: We go on multiplying our conveniences only to multiply our cares. We increase our possessions only to the enlargement of our anxieties.
en_quotes.author: Anna C. Brackett

en_quotes.quote: Some things cost way more when we keep them.
en_quotes.author: Neeraj Agnihotri

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is enough for the man to whom enough is too little.
en_quotes.author: Epicurus

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism is the pursuit of the essence of things, not the appearance.
en_quotes.author: Claudio Silvestrin

en_quotes.quote: Keep only those things that speak to your heart. Then take the plunge and discard all the rest. By doing this, you can reset your life and embark on a new lifestyle.
en_quotes.author: Marie Kondō

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism is a tool to eliminate life’s excess, focus on the essentials, and find happiness, fulfillment, and freedom.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately, minimalism is the thing that gets us past the things so we can focus on lives most important things~which actually arent things at all.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

en_quotes.quote: The things you own end up owning you.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

en_quotes.quote: We’re living our life depending on the space we’ve got rather than creating our space to fit our lives.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn & Ryan Nicodemus

en_quotes.quote: A home is a home for one reason: we call it home. The stuff doesn’t make it your home – you do.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

en_quotes.quote: We should be choosing what we want to keep, not what we want to get rid of.
en_quotes.author: Marie Kondō

en_quotes.quote: Reject the basic assumptions of civilization, especially the importance of material possessions
en_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

en_quotes.quote: Owning less is better than organizing more.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Becker

en_quotes.quote: Have nothing in your homes that you do not know to be useful or believe to be beautiful.
en_quotes.author: William Morris

en_quotes.quote: My riches consist, not in the extent of my possessions, but in the fewness of my wants.
en_quotes.author: Joseph Brotherton

en_quotes.quote: With a few flowers in my garden, half a dozen pictures, and some books, I live without envy.
en_quotes.author: Lope de Vega

en_quotes.quote: I have my own definition of minimalism, which is that which is created with a minimum of means.
en_quotes.author: La Monte Young

en_quotes.quote: It’s better to have extra time on your hands and extra money in your pocket than extra stuff in your closet.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Becker

en_quotes.quote: Simple can be harder than complex. You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple.
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: Declutter your mind, your heart, your home. Let go of the heaviness that is weighing you down. Make your life simple, but significant.
en_quotes.author: Maria Defillo

en_quotes.quote: If you need nice things to impress your friends, you have the wrong friends.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Becker

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism is not about having less. It’s about making room for more of what matters.
en_quotes.author: Melissa

en_quotes.quote: The space in which we live should be for the person we are becoming now, not for the person we were in the past.
en_quotes.author: Marie Kondō

en_quotes.quote: Truthfully, though, most organizing is nothing more than well~planned hoarding.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

en_quotes.quote: Minimalism is asking why before you buy.
en_quotes.author: Francine Jay

en_quotes.quote: Generally speaking, our stuff can be divided into three categories: useful stuff, beautiful stuff, and emotional stuff.
en_quotes.author: Francine Jay

en_quotes.quote: The more you have, the more you are occupied. The less you have, the more free you are.
en_quotes.author: Mother Teresa

en_quotes.quote: When given too many choices, people tend to worry that there’s something better out there than what they decided on.
en_quotes.author: Fumio Sasaki

en_quotes.quote: The people who are rebelling meaningfully don’t buy a lot of stuff.
en_quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

en_quotes.quote: There’s another benefit to a minimalist wardrobe. Because we choose items that are timeless, we don’t need to worry about being out of style.
en_quotes.author: Fumio Sasaki

en_quotes.quote: Clutter is not just the stuff on your floor – it’s anything that stands between you and the life you want to be living.
en_quotes.author: Peter Walsh

en_quotes.quote: More was never the answer. The answer, it turned out, was always less.
en_quotes.author: Cait Flanders

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not having what you want. It is wanting what you have.
en_quotes.author: Rabbi Hyman Schachtel

en_quotes.quote: Have nothing in your house that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful.
en_quotes.author: William Morris
